favourite.article: I love God and I will be repeating this message in my mind night and day.

I love the Scripture and the music sound awesome. I wish someone could sing the words to the song as it is playing so I can sing along since I have never heard this song. It would help a lot. Thanks for everything and God bless you!!!
Spanish Translation: youtube.com/watch?v=QRF1F_L2_y4

Por tanto con regocijo, Sacareis de las Aguas Salvación y direis Gloria A Dios! Por tanto con regocijo, Sacareis de las Aguas Salvación y direis Gloria A Dios! Clama al Senor, proclama sus hazañas a los pueblos. Mencionen su nombre exaltado. Proclamareis, habitantes de Sion pues grande es el Dios de Israel en medio de ti.

These are great ways of drinking Christ! I am ready to drink Christ day by day. Oh Lord Jesus! Thank You, Your name is above every name! I exalt You! because You are the Exalted one! Amen!! Oh Lord grant me the grace to drink You!

Praise the Lord for the wells of salvation!!! O, Lord Jesus, Amen! Your name is exalted. You are the Holy One! Now, You are the Spirit in our spirit. You are the flowing river of the living water within us! Praise the Lord!
Call upon His name! O LORD JESUS!
"Therefore with Joy shall ye draw water!"
Veary nice lesson. I enjoyed reading how do we drink the living water. Thank you. I will tell others about this great work.
Simply awesome! God is great and greatly to be praised on the harps, stringed instruments, timbrel and in song. Selah!
Praise the Lord!
Oh Lord, Amen, Hallelujah, Jesus, Triune God!
It's so beautiful. It ministered deeply to my soul. I can listen to it for hours.
Hallelujah! With joy shall we draw from the living water!

O Lord Jesus. Amen. Hallelujah! Praise the Lord for the church life. Praise the Lord that we can eat our church life. O Lord Jesus. O Lord Jesus. We love You! You are so attractive, sweet and delightful! Thank You for everything! You are truly the centrality and universality of God's divine economy. Amen.
Praise the Lord!!
Hallelujah!

I have not been able to meet for a couple of weeks now and I can feel the toll on my spirit. Reading through and enjoying the Psalms the Lord showed me Psalms 9. Speaking out loud th Psalm brought me to search for this hymn. What an enjoyment, what a Christ. And I received even more life from the crying out and shouting from the inhabitants of Zion! Praise the Lord for these refreshing life giving springs! Praise You Lord!!
Oh Lord Jesus !!
Oh Lord Jesus !!

I was praying in the Spirit this evening and the Holy Spirit dropped this verse in my spirit. Thank You Jesus for with Joy I shall draw water from Your wells/springs/fountain of Salvation. For out of my belly shall continue to flow rivers of living water. Thank You Lord Jesus for the fountains of my life is springing forth to the glory of Your Holy Name. Amen.
Praise the Lord!
Hallelujah! Inhabitants of Zion, come daily to the wells of salvation to draw water. Call O Lord Jesus and stay nourished and strengthened. Amen!

From the springs of the salvation. Hallelujah! The springs are plural. How plentiful it is! Now calling on the name of Jesus, sprouting out again God's mercy for us! Thanks for our practice of calling on the name of Jesus. It is our salvation now.

Praise the Lord Jesus! He went through incarnation, human living, crucifixion, resurrection and ascension, came as the consummated, all-inclusive, compound, life-giving Spirit, in order to be living water, the water of life, for us to drink! Let us draw Living Water from the wells of salvation day by day! Hallelujah! Living Water, we love You and we praise You! Living Water, save us to the uttermost!
The Lord is so rich! Calling His name brings Him into us; crying out will release Him out of us.
Praise the Lord! Cry out and shout for great is the Holy One in us!
Praise to Abba Father, thank you for the music and the lyrics. I was blessed!

How wonderful to come into the enjoyment of God and experience the joy of salvation. In our daily walk, how enjoyable to come in again and again into this experience. Oh Lord! WITH JOY I WANT TO DRAW WATER OF THE WELLS OF SALVATION!!!!! Praise the Lord!!!
We should call upon the name of the Lord day by day! Not only day by day but moment by moment so that our Lord Jesus will work within us!!!!!! Amen!
We need to rejoice in our Lord Jesus.
